title: Trade Policy Vote Could Affect Organized Labor's Role In 2016 Election
teaser: NPR's Don Gonyea interviews Steven Greenhouse, a former labor reporter for The New York Times, about the AFL-CIO's freeze on Democratic contributions in the lead-up to a key U.S. trade policy vote.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
